short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Split your browser tab into two panes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tab Splitter is a Chrome extension that allows users to split their browser tab into two panes, enabling side-by-side viewing of different web pages or different sections of the same page. This extension is perfect for multitasking, comparing content, or enhancing productivity while browsing.

Features
- Split any web page into two panes vertically or horizontally
- Adjustable split ratios (50-50, 60-40, 70-30, or custom)
- Resizable split with draggable divider
- Synchronized scrolling option for both panes
- Synchronized navigation option
- Light and dark themes
- Customizable settings that persist across sessions
